hidden.name:
2.1

Upload an example of a transaction document

2.2

Does your documentation contain details of the seller?

2.3

Does your documentation list the amount and description of the material purchased?

2.4

Does your documentation report the date of shipment and delivery?

2.5

Does your documentation show the country and address of origin?

3.1

Upload an example of a transaction document

3.2

Does your documentation contain details of the buyer?

3.3

Does your documentation list the amount and description of the material or product sold?

3.4

Does your documentation report the date of shipment and delivery?

3.5

Does your documentation show the country and address of origin?

6.1

Are all personnel handling incoming and outgoing materials trained to explain and work with this administrative link?

7.1

Does the Footwear Manufacturer have a segregation system to prevent commingling, and separately register hides for VF Corporation production?

7.2

Does the Footwear Manufacturer have written procedures in place for handling and documenting the materials used for VF corporation?

7.2.1

Upload all personal training records related to separation of batches

7.3

Is there an up-to-date system in place to record all the leather purchased for VF Corporation that is accessible at the any time?

7.4

In instances where the Footwear Manufacturer uses different facilities, is there an internal system in place that shows the location of each batch of leather during the process?

7.5

Is the Footwear Manufacturer able to prove during the process which leather is used in the process for VF Corporation?

7.6

Is the Footwear Manufacturer able to ensure that qualified leather ends up in the products for VF Corporation?

7.7

Each product season the Footwear Manufacturer must provide an overview to VF Corporation including a specification detailing all suppliers from which their leather is supplied and an overview for which VF Corporation products the leather is used. Do you have this VF overview document?

7.7.1

Does the overview specify which suppliers are used for each product?

7.7.2

Upload the VF overview document

7.8

Does the Footwear Manufacturer have the ability to trace the qualified products for VF Corporation in production at any time?

8.1.1

Material Type

8.1.2

Leather Material Composition

8.1.3

VF Branded Service for this Material

8.1.4

Total Annual Quantity of Material Produced for our Brand in 2017 (SQ. FT.)

8.1.5

2017 Estimated Annual Turnover for Total Quantity (USD)

8.2

Does the Finishing Tannery have LWG certification?

8.2.1

What rating has the Finishing Tannery earned?

8.2.1.1

Upload the Finishing Tannery's LWG certificate

8.2.2

Is the Finishing Tannery in the process of getting the certification within a year?

8.2.3

Does the Finishing Tannery have Brazilian Leather Certification of Sustainability (CSCB)?

8.2.3.1

Upload the CSCB certification

8.3

Does the Finishing Tannery have a segregation system to prevent commingling, and to separately register hides for VF Corporation production?

8.4

Does the Finishing Tannery have an appointed person responsible to work on Traceability/ LWG + Traceability who is aware of his/her responsibilities and ensures compliance?

8.5

Does the Finishing Tannery have the ability to trace the qualified products for VF Corporation in production at any time?

9.1

Does the Wet Blue Tannery maintain a detailed description linked to each lot/batch/shipment to the tannery?

9.2

Upload a sample invoice or equivalent documentation with shipment details

9.2.1

Does the sample invoice or equivalent certificate have the details of the supplier; such as the name, address, and internal identification code?

9.2.2

Does the sample invoice or equivalent certificate include the date(s) of slaughter?

9.2.3

Does the sample invoice or equivalent certificate include the number of hides?

9.2.4

Does the sample invoice or equivalent certificate include the intended customer (for qualified customers)?

9.3

Does the Wet Blue Tannery have LWG certification?

9.3.1

What rating has the Wet Blue Tannery earned?

9.3.1.1

Upload the Wet Blue Tannery's LWG certificate

9.3.2

Is the Wet Blue Tannery in the process of getting the certification within a year?

9.4

Does the Wet Blue Tannery have a segregation system to prevent commingling, and to separately register hides for VF Corporation production?

9.5

Does the Wet Blue Tannery stamp incoming hides with a code that links it back to the slaughterhouse from which the animals were slaughtered?

9.5.1

Does the Wet Blue Tannery maintain a document that explains the code and links it with the slaughterhouses in your supply chain?

9.5.2

Does the code that is stamped on the hide/ leather help determine the date on which animals were slaughtered?

9.6

Does the Wet Blue Tannery have an appointed person responsible to work on Traceability/ LWG + Traceability who is aware of his/her responsibilities and ensures compliance?

9.7

Does the Wet Blue Tannery have Brazilian Leather Certification of Sustainability (CSCB)?

9.7.1

Upload the CSCB certification

10.1

Does the slaughterhouse maintain a list of suppliers?

10.2

Upload one sample Invoice or Purchase Order per supplier

10.2

Upload a CAR certificate or equivalent farm registration system certificate

10.2.1

Does the slaughterhouse CAR certificate or equivalent farm registration system certificate of the farm include a contact person of the farm?

10.2.2

Does the slaughterhouse CAR certificate or equivalent farm registration system certificate of the farm include internal individual codes or names for each supplier used to identify them during processes?

10.3

Does the slaughterhouse have a procedure in place to ensure the slaughterhouse is not sourcing from farms involved in slave labour, invasion of indigenous lands and protected areas.

10.3

Does the slaughterhouse have a procedure in place to ensure the slaughterhouse is not sourcing from farms involved in slave labour, invasion of indigenous lands and protected areas, or farms included in IBAMA's embargo list?

10.3.1

Have any of the farms been involved in any form of deforestation in the Amazon biome since October 05, 2009?

10.4

Does the slaughterhouse monitor and record the location of farms its sourcing from?

10.4.1

Upload a spreadsheet with a list of all farmer IDs and addresses

10.5

Does the slaughterhouse operate in full compliance with all national and international legislations related to the handling and slaughtering of animals?

10.5

Does the slaughterhouse operate in full compliance with all national legislations (Normative Instruction 03/2000) related to the handling and slaughtering of animals?

10.6

Does the slaughterhouse have a procedure in place to ensure that all employees have the relevant skills and competencies to handle animals and to be involved in humane killing of animals?

10.6.1

Does the slaughterhouse have signed training records that are available for everyone involved in animal handling or sufficient practical experience that can be proved?

10.7

Does the slaughterhouse have procedure in place to ensure that the handling and movement of animals is minimised?

10.8

Does the slaughterhouse maintain a list of transportation companies used for each day or batch of live animals?

10.9

Does the slaughterhouse have health certificates for all purchased animals?

10.9.1

Are those certificates available upon request?

10.10

Do the slaughterhouses ensure that their transport companies are in compliance with the OIE requirements for transport related to planning, minimal distraction, animal behaviour and clear responsibilities (click here for OIE requirements)?

10.11

Do the slaughterhouses' transport companies use a GTA (Animal Transport Guide)?

10.11.1

Upload the most recent GTA from each farm the slaughterhouse is currently working with.
